news.title: Navi Mumbai: Cidco offers plots on sale as festive gift
news.para: The plots have been made available in Kharghar, Panvel, Pushpaknagar and near railway stations.

news.title: Cement, steel industries should use green hydrogen for energy: Nitin Gadkari
news.para: "It is now time for using green hydrogen as energy in the cement and steel industry in place of coal. We should work on value addition by running metal industries, where mining products are using green hydrogen as energy. We will have to protect the environment and increase our production at the same time," he said.

news.title: West Bengal: Three-month extension for real estate rebate window
news.para: The rebate window was originally slated to end on October 30 but CM Mamata Banerjee had indicated that it would be extended following an appeal by builders affiliated to state chapter of Confederation of Real Estate Developers of India (Credai).

news.title: Aurum PropTech to pick up 49% stake in Integrow Asset Management for Rs 25 crore
news.para: ​"The Board of Directors of Aurum PropTech Ltd...has approved the acquisition to effectively hold 49 per cent of the fully paid up equity share capital of Integrow Asset Management Pvt Ltd, a tech-led real-estate focused asset management company for an aggregate cash consideration of up to Rs 25 crore," a regulatory filing said.

news.title: Delhi corporations may make all properties up to 50 sqm free from tax burden
news.para: Former mayor Jai Prakash had first brought in the proposal that all residential properties up to 50 square metres, including those in approved colonies, rural areas and even unauthorised ones, may be exempt from paying house tax.

news.title: Revised Goa RERA rules allow return of registration fees
news.para: Real estate agents have to pay up to Rs 1 lakh and real estate developers Rs 50,000 to Rs 10 lakh for registration with RERA. However, if the registration is rejected, the present norms have no scope to return the funds.

news.title: HC stays North Goa collector's memo on nod for land conversions
news.para: The memorandum is unwarranted and nothing but an attempt to bypass orders of the Supreme Court and high court, Goa Foundation submitted.

news.title: MHA team to visit Chandigarh over leasehold to freehold conversion demand
news.para: The administration had recently written to the ministry for giving in-principle nod for conversion of leasehold properties into freehold. Pal had also met MHA officials and raised this demand.

news.title: Nagpur: NMC yet to raze illegal construction even after orders from President, PMO, CMO
news.para: A resident of Chinchbuvan and senior citizen, Vishnu Khawale, had alleged that despite repeated complaints, the Dhantoli zone did not act against “construction of an illegal building next to his house, owned by one Satyabhama Bobade”.

news.title: Chennai metro rail phase 2 construction on the right track
news.para: ​Already, preconstruction and construction on ground have commenced within the city and at suburban localities that will be linked on corridor-3 from Madhavaram to Siruseri Sipcot and corridor-4 from Light House to Poonamallee.

news.title: Ludhiana: Building branch reluctant to take action against violators
news.para: RTI activist Rohit Sabharwal made a complaint to chief secretary Punjab government and other officials against the civic officials for their inaction and callous attitude.

news.title: ED attaches properties of Patna's Patliputra Builders under PMLA
news.para: The two immovable properties that have been attached are located in Jharkhand's capital Ranchi. The ED case against the builder group was filed after taking cognisance of a Patna police FIR and charge sheet.

news.title: Chandigarh administration plans to make CHB nodal agency for land pooling policy
news.para: The CHB will work like Haryana Urban Development Authority (Huda) in Haryana, or Punjab Urban Planning and Development Authority (Puda) in Punjab.

news.title: Omaxe elevates Mohit Goel as its new managing director
news.para: The board of directors also re-designated Rohtas Goel, promoter of Omaxe group, as chairman & whole time director of the company. Rohtas Goel was earlier the chairman & managing director of the firm.

news.title: Delhi court denies bail to Avantha Group's promoter in money laundering case
news.para: The ED was probing an alleged transaction between Thapar's company Avantha Realty and YES Bank co-founder Rana Kapoor and his wife, who are already being investigated under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) by the agency.
